name: Protect the Earth (Ahmet Kamil Keleş)
description:
Meteors are falling to our Earth! Its only chance is you, the Earth Protector. You need to destroy the meteors before they reach the Earth.

We have 2 game modes: Firing rockets to the meteors or slicing the meteors with your mouse swipe.

3 Power-Ups: Health, Destroy All Meteors, Slow Time

CREDITS

2D Art: Ebru Kaplan, Ahmet Kamil Keles

Programming: Ahmet Kamil Keles

Special Thanks: Ezgi Çetin (for the idea of slicing meteors)
